title: Feign Death
content:
Feign Death Level 3 Necromancy Spell Put an ally in a protective coma. They become Resistant to all damage types except for Psychic. Disease and poison have no effect. 10 turns Melee Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Necromancy Spell

Put an ally in a protective coma. They become Resistant to all damage types except for Psychic. Disease and poison have no effect.
